programme.title: Khanka (Ep25)

Ghada Abdel Razek, Maged El Masry, Fathy Abd Alwahab, Carolin Khalil, Ahmed Abd El Wareth, Mohamed Gom`aa, Mahmoud Desouqy

programme.title: Taj (Ep20)
programme.desc: Action, Romance, Drama, History, Thriller 2024 In the midst of Syria's French mandate, boxer Taj fights not just in the ring, but against accusations of treason from within the resistance, leading him on a gripping journey to prove his loyalty and innocence. Taym Hassan, Bassam Kousa, Dogana Isa, Farah Al Dabiyat, Noura Rahhal, Samer Al Barqawi, Omar Abu Saada, Taim Hasan, Bassam Kouss, Dogana Essa, Farah Al Dbayyat, Nora Rahal, Faia Younan

programme.title: Exit 7 (Ep6)
programme.desc: Comedy, People, Drama 2020 Various sketches depicting the social issues that face the Saudi people approached from a humorous perspective. programme.title: Katha Ankahee (Ep90)
programme.desc: Drama, Family, Thriller, Bollywood 2022 While seeking money for her child's healthcare needs, Katha is in trouble after Viaan's offer to help her. Aditi Sharma, Adnan Khan, Azinkya Mishra, Samar Vermani, Jasveenn Kaur, Ravi Bhushan

programme.title: Ayyoub (Ep14)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2018 In a bid to improve his life, a modest young man strives to handle multiple jobs, but his friends and relatives throw him in prison. programme.title: The Queen (Ep35)
programme.desc: Drama 2023 Fame, fortune, and love, Ates, one of the country's most iconic basketball players, and his wife Deniz had it all, until a devastating scandal shattered their perfect world. Cevdet Mercan, Serhan Sahin, Ava DuVernay, Burcu Özberk, Gokhan Alkan, Selin Sekerci

programme.title: Golden Boy (Ep35)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2022 Fareed is a reckless young man who prompts his grandfather to force him to marry, thinking he will learn to take responsibility. His family chooses Seyran, whose life will change completely. Afra Saraçoglu, Mert Ramazan Demir, Gülçin Santircioglu, Emre Altug, Beril Pozam, Burcu Alptekin, Gulseren Budayicioglu

programme.title: The Game: Playing With Seniors (Ep9)
programme.desc: Comedy, Drama 2022 It seems almost impossible for Mazu and Wassim to stop challenging each other despite the difficulties they encountered in the previous game rounds. Hesham Majed, Shiko, Mai Kassab, Mirna Gamil, Mohammad Tharwat, Ahmed Fathy, Moataz Al Tony, Ahmed Saad Wali

programme.desc: Comedy, People, Drama 2023 Kaltham's innocence appears after 25 years in jail, and she gets released from prison, but she is shocked to be rejected by her daughters and society overall. Hayat Al Fahad, Soaad Ali, Shimaa Aly, Buthaina Al Raisi, Reem Abdullah, Abdulaziz Al Nassaar, Seod Bo Ebid, Ali Shams

programme.title: Genius (Ep136)
programme.desc: People, Drama, Family 2024 Mathematics prodigy Devran comes face-to-face with the father who abandoned them years ago, just as he prepares to leave the country. Old wounds resurface, reigniting his thirst for revenge and escalating the battle between good and evil. Umut Aral, Damla Serim, Aras Bulut Iynemli, Ugur Polat, Taner Ölmez, Onur Saylak, Melis Sezen, Taner Olmez

programme.title: What If You Love Too Much (Ep35)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2023 Ates is forced return to his hometown of Istanbul and carry out the will of his recently deceased father, while Leyla is a manipulative girl whose goal is to find her family. The two's paths cross in an unfathomable way that neither can fully understand. Kerem Bursin, Hafsanur Sancaktutan, Hatice Aslan, Serif Erol, Nazmi Kirik, Ali Bilgin, Ahmet Ruhan Arca

programme.title: A Pencil (Ep11)
programme.desc: People, Drama, Thriller 2024 A Kuwaiti family suffers a tragedy during the Kuwaiti war as they lose their daughter while attempting to evacuate the country. Years later, they're granted another chance when the girl returns to learn more about her previous life. programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: My Poober: Sam and Cat are charged with getting a babysitting client to give up her "Poober" - her ratty old stuffed animal. This proves more difficult than it first appears. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Peezy B: Sam gets a job as the assistant to the rap star Peezy B. Meanwhile, Cat finds babysitting much more challenging without Sam around to help. Guest starring Kel Mitchell. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Crime After Crime: Hank creates a neighbourhood watch group when crimes start happening. Max takes the blame to hide his secret, so the family must catch the real criminal. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: You Stole My Thunder, Man: When Max wins the school election that Phoebe had been working hard for, Phoebe plots revenge. (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thundersense: Phoebe gets the ability to sense danger before it happens, and uses it to impress her classmates. Meanwhile, Max pretends that he has not got his new power yet. (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Paw-zzle Pieces: To discover the cause of her mother's disappearances, Clawdeen opens a portal in the Monster High catacombs and releases... her brother Clawd? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Situation - Grim: Sonic learns that Nine is using the New Yoke shard to create his dream world in a barren shatterspace called The Grim. Can Sonic convince Nine to fight with him? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Situation - Grim: Sonic learns that Nine is using the New Yoke shard to create his dream world in a barren shatterspace called The Grim. Can Sonic convince Nine to fight with him? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: The Thundermans Return
programme.desc: The Thundermans must return to Hiddenville after a mishap strips them of their crimefighting duties. Hank and Barb enjoy their old home, and Billy and Nora look forward to a normal high school life.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luan gets Lori a job at the Burnt Bean in 'Trouble Brewing', then in 'The Cling and I', Lana tries to stop Lily from clinging to her. (S8, ep 13)

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Mayor Fleck is in danger of a public pranking in 'Fool on Fleck', and then in 'Ramping Up', Fire Marshal Finn McCormack increases safety measures to the new stunt show. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Hefty decides to take Timid under his wing in 'Curing Private Timid', and then in 'Smurfette Overdoes It!', Smurfette wears herself out, so Lazy teaches her the art of doing nothing. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Ghost Train: There's a mysterious mystery for detective Pilou. Buddy and Derence ask for help because Meow City's cat treats have been disappearing for three nights in a row. (S2, ep 48)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Return to the Upside Down World: The Buffycats are using a robot that vacuums up dirt and transforms it into delicious smells when Strangecat invites them to play in the Upside Down World. (S2, ep 49)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Choo Choo the Donkey: Charlie The Cat and the Buffycats organize the Furry Marathon: the athletes will have to read the directions to figure out which route to follow. (S2, ep 50)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best's sound effects threaten to derail Bester's one chance to shine in 'Stage Struck', then in 'Ball Count', a case of missing golf balls escalates into a full-on mountain rescue mission. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant in 'SpongeBob's Place', then in 'Plankton Gets the Boot', Plankton gets kicked out of the house.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their 'Life Insurance' protects them from any danger, then in 'Burst Your Bubble', SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, and everyone in town wants one!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When Smurfette rescues Brainy from a snake, the others ask her to teach them "Smurf-Fu', then in 'Diaper Daddy', everyone is tired of changing Baby's diapers, Handy invents a robot to help.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Hefty casts a spell which turns him into a colossal nose in 'Who Nose?', then in 'Clumsy Not Clumsy', Gargamel tempts Clumsy with a magic amulet that makes his clumsiness disappear. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Karen tells the fairytale of a nerd trying to steal an action figure in 'Big Bad Bubble Bass', then in 'Sea-Man Sponge Haters Club', Squidward hosts a secret We Hate SpongeBob Club at his house.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast in 'Late for Breakfast', then in 'Bummer Jobs', Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Unwelcome to the Jungle: Sonic finds himself in a strange jungle world with even stranger tree-dwelling versions of his friends, whom he must protect from a "monster" below. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Thundreth: Nearing their 100th save, Phoebe & Max are determined to make it their best one yet. But they overlook a super villain plotting revenge on his old rivals - Hank and Barb. (S4, ep 29)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Spelling Bee Hard: Dr. Minyak challenges Captain Man to a Spelling Bee. (S4, ep 19)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy invents a camera for Painter in 'Say Smurf for the Camera!', and in 'Manners Matter', Papa Smurf is nervous about the Nature Fairy's visit, so asks Willow to teach the Smurfs manners. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Wild stays in Papa Smurf's house in 'The Guest Who Wouldn't Leave', then in 'Where's My Smurfway?', Blossom misplaces Brainy's beloved Smurfway, and has to find it before Brainy finds out. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Bad reviews lead to trouble in the Krusty Krab in 'Bulletin Board', and then in 'Sandy's Nutmare', Sandy creates the latest acorn-based food sensation, but her tree pays the price for her greed.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Gary gets lost outside, he has to go on an incredible journey to get back home in 'Food Con Castaways', and then in 'Snail Mail', Spongebob accidentally fibs to his pen pal, and must keep it up!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The family takes a reading challenge in 'Read Aloud', then in 'Not a Loud', Lincoln discovers that the first page of his baby book is blank, and worries his parents are hiding something. (S2, ep 23)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The kids give her an old singing toy to get her to stop crying in 'The Crying Dame', and in 'Anti Social', Dad declares war on the kids' devices so they show him how great electronics are. (S2, ep 25)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Patrick Show gets competing sponsors in 'The Patrick Show Sells Out', then in 'Neptune's Ball', the Star family visits King Neptune's palace. (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock in 'Broken Alarm', and then in 'Karen's Baby', Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Better Off Wed: The kids learn that Dr. Colosso ruined their parents' wedding years earlier, and want to recreate Hank & Barb's dream day as their anniversary gift. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Danger Games - Part 1: When Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's concert, Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe. (S4, ep 1)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel meets his nephews Dwayne and Rowena in 'Family Time', then in 'Smurf vs Machine', Handy is jealous of DD. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: It's Smurfies versus Gargamel in 'See Gargamel Run', then in 'Hefty Baby', Baby Smurf gets stronger. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Stars run a Patrick Show theme park in their home in 'Patrick Show Land', then in 'Legend of the Lost Bathroom', Patrick and Squidina embark on a quest to find the lost bathroom. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Barking Up the Wrong Tree: Sonic is shocked that the Boscage Maze "Monster" is Amy AKA Thorn Rose. Wielding a Paradox Prism shard, Thorn wages war on the tree-dwelling Scavengers. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout -Part 1: SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout -Part 2: SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: No Friend In Sight: Chloe feels smothered by Max and Phoebe, and encourages them to make new friends. However, the twins unwittingly make the same friend, and begin a battle over her. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Dream A Little Dream: At a sleepover, Taylor dreams that Uncle Charlie is in danger and trying to contact her. Soon she discovers her friends are sharing the same dream. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Toon In For Danger: When Henry and Ray get a copy of the new Kid Danger & Captain Man cartoon and see that it's horrible, they must hurry to fix the cartoon before the big premiere party. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Car Trek: Charlotte's birthday road trip to see the Boo Man Group perform gets sidetracked by a Captain Man and Kid Danger emergency. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Why You Buggin'?: After discovering that Link's ex-girlfriend is a secret supervillain who wants Link for herself, Phoebe enlists Max's help in exposing her rival's true motives. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Exit Stage Theft: Max tries to reestablish his evil cred with petty crimes, but when his best friends become a target, he must choose between them and his reputation. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Class Action Heroes: Danger Force is crushing it at Swellview Junior High, but Ray misses his sidekicks and schemes to get them out of school. (S2, ep 23)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Locked Up! Part 1: Summer looks bleak until Tori gets everyone a free holiday! The destination is a nightmare and things go from bad to worse when Tori accidentally assaults a dignitary. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: Popularity Papers

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: All the President's Thunder-Men: After their requests drive Kickbutt to quit, Max and Phoebe get what they want when Hank is made SuperPresident. But being the First Family takes its toll. (S4, ep 32)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Mad Max - Beyond Thunderhome: Max finally declares his independence from his parents' house rules and moves to his friend's house, where they only rule is that there are no rules! (S4, ep 28)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Bermuda Queen: Taylor and the gang discover a symbol that leads them on a treasure hunt all over Rock Island, resulting in an incredible discovery! (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gumbearable: After accidentally swallowing a piece of gum, Owen has to protect his friends by jumping into a gum volcano. (S3 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Queen Banana: When Chloe gets akumatized into Queen Banana, Ladybug decides to entrust a Miraculous to a new and promising ally to help her stop the supervillain. (S4 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Bearly Edible: After eating snacks meant for everyone and replacing them with disgusting low budget cookies from Barfvomita, Owen is full of guilt and tries to make things right. (S3 Ep32)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Polar Bear: Nutty Hill is suffering from a heat wave. Searching for a bit of cool air, Grizzy has a brilliant idea. He'll get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Spread: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV, he discovers that the pantry is empty! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Cellular Bear: Grizzy's nap is interrupted by the forest ranger's cell phone. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Jurassic Bear: Freed by the thawing ice, a giant egg slides up to the front door of the cabin. The lemmings watch the hatching of a baby dinosaur that soon thinks they are its parents. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness: In order to woo the she-bear he's infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and get into shape with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Itch: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied dance the lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, it's panic all round! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Thirst Quencher: It's another heatwave and even the riverbed has dried up. A very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the lemmings have used the last of the water to fill their inflatable pool. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Spider Lemmings: The lemmings have caught a spider and her sticky, elastic threads are perfect for bungee jumping, but Grizzy discovers that he has arachnophobia. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: High Voltage Bear Attack: The lemmings are having a party, but when Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river he sparks a power cut! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Scents: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the ranger's cabin. Can he bring them to her without the lemmings ruining them? (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Luck: After making a fool of himself in front of she-bear, Grizzy finds a four-leaf clover which seems to bring him good luck. Could his chance be changing? (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Magnetic Bear: Grizzy can't believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves, but it's the lemmings who are playing around. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Pan fod gan 'Po Danfon' ormod o focsys i'w danfon, mae'n rhaid i'r tîm feddwl yn ofalus sut i'w gosod yn y tryc. When Po's delivery has too many boxes, the team have to think fast.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Ceiniog a Niwc - dau air, ond un ystyr. Lwsi sy'n edrych ar yr amrywiaeth o eiriau ni'n defnyddio mewn gwahanol ardaloedd. Lwsi looks at the variety of words we use in different areas.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn wedi trefnu dawns-ginio ac yn cael gwersi cha cha cha gan Mama Polenta. Siôn learns the cha cha cha, but has to improvise when the town hall roof collapses.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Pam bod gyda ni goed?' yw cwestiwn Meg heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu ateb doniol am y Brenin Boliog oedd ar dân eisiau mynd i barti pen-blwydd Tywysoges. Today Meg asks 'What are trees for?.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae prinder dwr ym Mhen Cyll. Mae Digbi a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio dysgu pam. There's a water-shortage in Pen Cyll. Digbi and his friends go in search of the reason.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Tro ma bydd Meleri'n ymweld a Sioe Aberystwyth yng nghwmni Tomi, Ianto a Morys & mae Mali a Macs yn cael hwyl ar dwyni tywod Merthyr Mawr. Huw and Elan meet two friends who enjoy riding.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Dyw Pablo ddim yn deall pam fod dwylo Magi mor ddiddorol. Mae o wir eisiau cyffwrdd croen yr hen wraig ond nid yw'n siwr os y dylai! Today Pablo really wants to feel Magi's wrinkled hands!

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae cystadleuaeth y Trên Blodau yn cyd-fynd â noson arbennig Crugwen a Dai. Ond mae 'na broblem! The Flower Train competition coincides with Crugwen and Dai's night. But there's a problem!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twm Twrch yn ysbiwr am y dydd tra bod y Garddwr wedi dewis Emrys, Rodrigo a Dorti i fod ar yr ochor ddrwg er mwyn ei helpu i ddwyn Llyfryn. Twm Twrch has become a spy for the day.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus yn llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Pigog, Gwich, Dan a Crawc yn mynd lan yr afon i chwilio am y Graig Canu ddirgel. Pigog, Gwich, Dan and Crawc go on a boat journey upriver to find the mysterious Song Stone.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Loli'n joio chwarae gyda'r ffiltyrs ar ffôn newydd ei mam ond mae pethau'n mynd rhy bell wrth iddi fynd i fewn i'r ffôn. Loli steps into the phone while playing with Mum's new filters!

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i edych 'nôl dros rai o gyfarchion pen-blwydd yr wythnos. A look back at some of this week's birthday greetings.

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Ffoaduriaid o'r Wcrain sy'n diolch i staff Gwersyll yr Urdd Llangrannog am eu cymorth wrth iddynt ymgartrefu yng Nghymru dros dro. This time, Ukrainian refugees say thank you with flowers.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Meinir yn hau er mwyn lliwio gardd Pant-y-Wennol yn 2026, ac Adam yn creu prydau maethlon o'r ardd yng Nghaerfyrddin. Sioned visits a garden centre, with tips on designing a border.

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Cyfres wedi'i chyflwyno gan Heledd Cynwal, yn helpu 4 teulu sy'n ysu am gi. Bydd y teulu'n treulio amser gyda phob ci dan olwg camerau cudd y ty. We help four families desperate for a dog.

programme.title: Cynefin
programme.desc: Heledd Cynwal, Iestyn Jones a Siôn Tomos Owen sy'n crwydro Bae Colwyn, un o drysorau glan môr Cymru. The crew tour the Colwyn Bay area - one of Wales's most popular seaside resorts.

programme.title: Taith Bywyd
programme.desc: Clywn am amser Peredur ap Gwynedd yn teithio'r byd, a'n ail-gysylltu gyda'i athro gitar cyntaf ar ôl 32 o flynyddoedd. World famous guitarist, Peredur ap Gwynedd, tours his past with Owain.

programme.title: Cyfres Triathlon Cymru 2025
programme.desc: Un o'r hen ffefrynnau, Triathlon Sbrint Llanelli, sy'n rhoi Cyfres Triathlon Cymru ar ben ffordd. One of the old favourites, Llanelli Sprint Triathlon, kicks off the Wales Triathlon Series.

programme.title: Am Dro
programme.desc: Y tro hwn: teithiau o amgylch Dinas Mawddwy; o Borth y Gest i Forfa Bychan; i Stad yr Hafod, Cwm Ystwyth ac i draeth Pentywyn, Sir Gar. Competing today are Arfon, Sophie, Julie and Daniel.

programme.title: Yr Ynys: Zanzibar
programme.desc: Dylan Iorwerth sy'n ymweld â Zanzibar i weld ymdrechion yr ynyswyr i ddianc rhag y gorffennol. Dylan Iorwerth explores Zanzibar to see how the islanders are escaping the shadows of the past.

programme.title: Darn Bach o Hanes
programme.desc: Bydd Dewi'n olrhain hanes y tair prif enghraifft o'r ymdrech i feddiannu tir ar gyfer dibenion milwrol yng Nghymru. Dewi looks at attempts to acquire land in Wales for military purposes.

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Rydym yn nigwyddiad Ffermio'r Ucheldir; ac hefyd yn pigo i Sioe Aberystwyth i gwrdd a merch sy'n arddangos da byw. Melanie visits a family who have transformed a barn into a wedding venue.

programme.title: Western Force v Y Llewod
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Gêm Agoriadol y Gyfres ar y Daith: Western Force v Y Llewod Prydeinig a Gwyddelig. Stadiwm Optus. Series Opening Tour Match highlights: Western Force vs British & Irish Lions.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nôl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Pablo

programme.title: Look At Life The Needles Point the Way
